post:
I got a reseller from beijing teletron (it is said the largest datacenter in Asia)

I can offer this plan for $5.7

_CPU:Intel XEON E5620 2.40GHz 1 Core 
RAM:512M DDRIII 
HDD:60G SAS+40G Cloud 
Location: Beijing
Bandwidth: Unlimited Transfer on 5Mbps Port
1 ip address
VMware_
Free Windows 2003 (Chinese only, if you want English version, do it yourself!) and CentOS 5.6
NO OTHER OPERATING SYSTEMS.

No Control Panel, just a ticket system (If you don't know Chinese, I can help you submit the ticket at 6:00 p.m GMT +8 for I am still a student ).


Order Link: http://my.starrydns.com/cart.php?gid=7
Switch to English at right-bottom.

Accept Payment: Paypal and Alipay.


you can use this vps for:

1. go inside the Great Firewall of China to experience. (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Great_Firewall_of_China#Technical_implementation)

2. set a vpn and watch free films on Youku, Tudou or others.

3. make a website (it has a good speed to China mainland.), You don't need domain real-name registration system until your water meter is checked. If you were checked, your traffic will go through Hongkong.

4. monitoring your service status in China.

5. etc....


Edit:
before you buy this vps, you should know:
1. you must submit a ticket if you wanna reboot/reinstall your system. ( I can help you submit the ticket at 6:00 pm GMT +8 )
2. you may wait a long time (maybe 10 hours) after your ticket get response.
3. the vps is set up by hand (they don't provide api), on Workdays (Monday to Friday) 17:30-18:20,22:00-22:30 GMT+8 and Weekends (Saturday/Sunday) 9:00-22:00 GMT +8.
4. the vps may perform bad (outage, low I/O, low network speed, etc)



Sorry for my poor English, I hope you can understand what I mean.

Don't hesitate to contact me if you have any questions.

My Gtalk: lijunyan96@gmail.com
